biotools.summary:
> TOOL (matuskalas) | Comprehensively benchmarking applications for detecting copy number variation | The RDXplorer is a computational tool for copy number variants (CNV) detection in whole human genome sequence data using read depth (RD) coverage. CNV detection is based on the Event-Wise Testing (EWT) algorithm recently published by our group
Note: (matuskalas): Lumpy (or lumpy-sv) is a completely different tool, atm missing in bio.tools (https://github.com/arq5x/lumpy-sv)

bioschemas.name: RDXplorer
bioschemas.summary:
> TOOL (matuskalas) | Comprehensively benchmarking applications for detecting copy number variation | The RDXplorer is a computational tool for copy number variants (CNV) detection in whole human genome sequence data using read depth (RD) coverage. CNV detection is based on the Event-Wise Testing (EWT) algorithm recently published by our group
Note: (matuskalas): Lumpy (or lumpy-sv) is a completely different tool, atm missing in bio.tools (https://github.com/arq5x/lumpy-sv)
